definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: The first is how empty it was at al Asad Air Base, where he landed.
sentences.chinese: 第一個就是他落地的阿薩德空軍基地空無一人。

sentences.english: But Assad shows no sign of heeding their calls for him to step down.
sentences.chinese: 但是沒有跡象顯示阿薩德會響應他們的號召下臺。

sentences.english: The United States should loudly denounce Assad and voice support his opponents.
sentences.chinese: 美國要旗幟鮮明地譴責阿薩德，並聲援反對他的人。

sentences.english: Mr. Assad continues to have some supporters among world powers.
sentences.chinese: 阿薩德仍得到世界上一些大國的支持。

sentences.english: They chanted slogans against the government and against President Bashar al-Assad.
sentences.chinese: 他們高呼反政府和反對總統阿薩德的口號。

sentences.english: The demonstrators chanted and waved flags and pictures of the president.
sentences.chinese: 示威者高呼口號，並揮舞着旗幟和阿薩德總統的照片。

sentences.english: Protests against President Bashar al-Assad have re-erupted across Syria.
sentences.chinese: 反對總統巴沙爾阿薩德的抗議在敘利亞又一次爆發了。

sentences.english: Assad in power is the direct result of weaponisation ofhim by the white pig putin.
sentences.chinese: 阿薩德政權就是白種人普京武器支持的直接結果。

sentences.english: Gunfire crackles. Voices rise in crescendo, chanting for the regime to fall.
sentences.chinese: 槍聲四起，打到阿薩德政權的呼聲一浪高過一浪。

sentences.english: Many are members of the Assad clan or smugglers and racketeers from the coastal region.
sentences.chinese: 許多是阿薩德派或是沿海地區的走私販和詐騙者。

sentences.english: Hafiz al-Asad created an organizational infrastructure to consolidate control.
sentences.chinese: 阿薩德建立了基礎組織機構來鞏固控制。

sentences.english: Hand Lebanon back to Mr Assad in order to split Syria from Iran?
sentences.chinese: 讓阿薩德重新控制黎巴嫩以便分化伊朗和敘利亞？

sentences.english: On the other hand, Syria under the Assad family remains tightly controlled.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，敘利亞還處在阿薩德家族嚴密控制之中。

sentences.english: “I think President al-Assad is a very honest person and he will change,”says Tarcha.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得阿薩德總統非常聰明，他應該會有所改變。
